leave-desc: Leave your current game of global Connect4.
connect4-help:
If you want to play against yourself or you have someone next to you, do `{0}connect4` and mention yourself.
If you want to play against a specific person, do `{0}connect4` and mention them.
If you want to play a global game (cross-server), do `{0}connect4` and mention the bot.
ready-player-global: Waiting for someone from another server to join...
game-timeout: Nobody made a move for {0} seconds! The game has been cancelled.
game-over-tied: The game is tied! The board is full and no 4-in-a-rows have been made.
